title: Oman officially confirms Ramadan 2026 to begin on February 19
summary_full: Oman has officially announced February 19, 2026, as the start of Ramadan 1447 AH, becoming the first nation to do so. This early confirmation, based on astronomical calculations, allows for seamless preparations. The Sultanate also introduced reduced working hours for public and private sectors, fostering a balance between work and spiritual observance.
